name: Jungle Safari - Animal Daycare
description:
Animal Pet Day Care is all about dress up and pet care games.
Cute little animal pet are injured. Take care of them.
Clean them to kill all bacteria.
Tons of activities with all animal pet.
Choose your favourite animal pet from the unique puppies with their different skin tones.
Jungle Safari Animal Pet Day Care is very famous game.

Animal Pets need to bath, eat and play with. In this game, you need to take good care of the pet by clicking the different icons to complete different operations.

How can you know about your pet’s status? Just keep your eyes on the bar which signify various parts of pet’s physical and mental, green is good and you need to care him when state is red.

Features :
- Spa
- Care
- Dressup
